title: Launch HN: Channel3 (YC S25) – A database of every product on the internet
author: glawrence13
summary: • Channel3 is a comprehensive database of all products online. • It aims to streamline product discovery and comparison. • Built by Y Combinator S25, it leverages community contributions.

title: Pixel Watch 4 Launches with Satellite SOS: Hands-On
author: nradov
summary:
• Pixel Watch 4 introduces Satellite SOS feature for emergency communication.
• Enhanced health tracking capabilities included.
• Improved battery life and performance enhancements noted.
